WelcomePage.title: Welcome to Life Map
WelcomePage.description: Discover the world through an interactive map showing countries where I've worked, visited, and gained valuable experiences.
WelcomePage.footer: Explore the world through my journey

worked.description: From 2016 to 2018 worked part-time for a non-profit organization. In 2021 freelanced for personal clients, websites based on ReactJS and GatsbyJS.

Frontend Developer in two big projects: website for all university admissions and corporate CMS. Implemented from scratch frontend testing system, based on Jest and Storybook. Worked with 10+ legacy projects.
Sole Frontend Developer in admin panel project for a payment system. Full frontend development in React. Moved legacy projects from Vue to React.

Senior Developer at War Thunder Mobile. From beta test to full release and multiple major updates. Implemented 10+ major game features (UI and logic), including a new research tree and an in-game ads system. Fixed hundreds of bugs. Proud to have played a significant role in creating the best mobile game.

experienced.description: Digital nomad experience, learned Thai language basics, explored local culture and cuisine
Spiritual journey and meditation retreat, learned about yoga and mindfulness practices
Trekking expedition to Everest Base Camp, learned about mountaineering and local Sherpa culture
Business trip and cultural exchange, learned about Central Asian traditions and nomadic culture
Mountain trekking and cultural immersion, learned about Pamir traditions and local hospitality
